title: Conjunction
alt: The IAU is sad to announce that at 00:39 UTC on December 22nd, Jupiter and Saturn did unfortunately come into contact, and appear to have blooped together.
transcript:
What people imagine astronomers observing a conjunction are like
[Cueball and Megan are both looking through telescopes]
Cueball: 6.15 arcminutes!
Megan: Stupendous! This confirms Einstein!
What they're actually like
Cueball: Wow! Look how close they are!
Megan: It's so cool!
Cueball: Now kiiiisssss!!
Megan: Dooo iiit!
